example[2]: His friends are a strange lot.

definition[1]: your lot is your work, duties, social position etc, especially when they could be better
example[5]: She seems happy enough with her lot.
example[6]: The unions have always tried to improve the lot of their members.
definition[2]: an area of land used for building on or for another purpose

definition[3]: a building and the land surrounding it where films are made
definition[4]: something, or a group of things, that is sold at an auction

definition[6]: to choose something or someone by lot
